name: All Natural
description:
A baby tries to recover his Super Powers by eating only natural and healthy food and avoiding the mean plastic food that tries to kill him on his way! Will he be able to recover all his strength and and survive this plastic food invasion by staying all natural?

This was a project made by a group of 3 people in a Mini Game Jam hosted in my college in only about 8 hours and it has the following features:

- 3 different waves scaling its difficulty with time;

- 6 types of food (3 all natural and 3 plastic) randomly spawned all around the levels to add up to the challenge and replayability;

-  Cartoony visuals to add up to it's comic feeling!

Have fun!

Music used: 

- Pokemon Trainer Victory Theme:
